# Locale.IdentifierType.bcp47

**Case**

The type of BCP 47 language identifiers.

## Declaration

```swift
case bcp47
```

## Discussion

An example of this type is `th-TH-u-ca-gregory-nu-thai`.

## Standard Identifier Types

- **Locale.IdentifierType.icu**: The type of identifiers that follow ICU (International Components for Unicode) conventions.
- **Locale.IdentifierType.cldr**: The type of identifiers that follow CLDR (Common Locale Data Repository) conventions.
